front.title: Evader & Monnok
front.gametext: USED: Cancel all Revolutions in play. OR If opponent has 13 or more cards in hand, place all but 8 (random selection) in Used Pile.  LOST: Use 4 Force to reveal opponent's hand. All cards opponent has two or more of in hand are lost.

rulings: The second Used function still has its result even if the opponent plays any response(s) that reduces their hand size below 13 cards.
